pair.title: Searching for Soma Smart Shades devices

info.title: Keep in mind:
info.row1: For an optimal signal strength keep Soma within a close distance of Homey.
info.row2: Always download the original `Soma Smart Shades` app and add the devices to the app. This automatically updates the Soma's firmware to the latest version.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions:
faq.question1: Why can't the Soma be found by Homey?
faq.answer1: Check if the Soma is not connected to another bluetooth device. The `Soma Smart Shades` app for example

interval.label: Interval between updates in minutes
interval.info: The delay between reading Soma values in minutes. The minimal interval is 5 minutes. The default interval is 15 minutes.

mqttserver.receive: MQTT Topic to RECEIVE (see info below)                :
mqttserver.info: This funcion Publish at following Topics: SomaShade/RISEXXX/(position/state/battery)/value
mqttserver.info2: Where RISEXXX is SomaShadeName, followed by action and value.
mqttserver.info3: Also subscribe to RECEIVE topic (ej:move) (SomaShade/RISEXXX/move/value) to receive external actions.
